original: nor bu'i skar mdog gi bla re dag dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi lda ldi de dag dang / dril bu g-yer ka'i dra ba dag dang / khrung khrung rkang de dag rlung gis bskyod pa las 'di lta ste //
analyzed: nor bu'i skar mdog gi bla re dag dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi lda ldi de dag dang / dril bu g-yer ka'i dra ba dag dang / khrung khrung rkang de dag rlung gis bskyod pa las 'di lta ste //
translated: When the jeweled canopies, the jeweled tassels, the nets of small bells, and the cranes were stirred by the wind,

original: dper na / rol mo sil snyan yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa mkhas pas dkrol ba de lta bur snyan la /
analyzed: dper na / rol mo sil snyan yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa mkhas pas dkrol ba de lta bur snyan la /
translated: a sound arose that was as pleasant as the music of the eight types of instruments played by skilled musicians.

original: de lta bu'i yid du 'ong zhing mnyan na bde ba'i sgra byung bar gyur to //
analyzed: de lta bu'i yid du 'ong zhing mnyan na bde ba'i sgra byung bar gyur to //
translated: Such a delightful and pleasant sound arose.

original: sgra des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gang bar gyur te /
analyzed: sgra des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gang bar gyur te /
translated: That sound filled the entire trichiliocosm.

original: sems can gang gis rgyan gyi sgra de dag thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to //
analyzed: sems can gang gis rgyan gyi sgra de dag thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to //
translated: All the sentient beings who heard the sound of those ornaments became irreversible from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de nas klu'i bu mo de dag gis me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char dang / spos chu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char mngon par phab par gyur te /
analyzed: de nas klu'i bu mo de dag gis me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char dang / spos chu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char mngon par phab par gyur te /
translated: Then those nāga daughters caused a rain of various flowers and a rain of various fragrant waters to fall.

original: me tog gi char de bab pa'i tshe spos kyi dri zhim po'i ngad byung ste 'gro zhing ldog go /
analyzed: me tog gi char de bab pa'i tshe spos kyi dri zhim po'i ngad byung ste 'gro zhing ldog go /
translated: When that rain of flowers fell, a fragrance of sweet perfume arose and spread.

original: spos chu'i char de bab pas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po'i kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad spos chus rdzab tu gyur te /
analyzed: spos chu'i char de bab pas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po'i kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad spos chus rdzab tu gyur te /
translated: When that rain of fragrant water fell, the entire area around the city of Kapilavastu, to a radius of sixty leagues, became a swamp of fragrant water.

original: spos kyi dri des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen @143b po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gang bar gyur to //
analyzed: spos kyi dri des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen @143b po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gang bar gyur to //
translated: That fragrance spread and filled the world systems of the great trichiliocosm.

original: sems can gang gis spos kyi dri de tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to //
analyzed: sems can gang gis spos kyi dri de tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to //
translated: All the sentient beings who smelled that incense became irreversible from unsurpassed and perfect awakening.

original: de nas klu'i bu mo de dag gis gdugs bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug dang / rta bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug dang / rol mo sil snyan bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa de dag bar snang gi nam mkha' la 'khod de /
analyzed: de nas klu'i bu mo de dag gis gdugs bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug dang / rta bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug dang / rol mo sil snyan bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa de dag bar snang gi nam mkha' la 'khod de /
translated: Then, those nāga daughters, with those ninety-six billion parasols, ninety-six billion horses, and ninety-six billion musical instruments and cymbals, made offerings to the Blessed One. Adorned with all ornaments, they rose up into the sky above and

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur to //
translated: bowed their heads to the Blessed One’s feet. They circumambulated the Blessed One three times, placed their palms together in homage to the Blessed One, and then sat to one side.

original: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so //
analyzed: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so //
translated: At that time, they also spoke these verses:

original: klu yi bu mo mkhas pa de dag yid rangs dga' mgu yid kyis su //
analyzed: klu yi bu mo mkhas pa de dag yid rangs dga' mgu yid kyis su //
translated: Those wise nāga daughters were delighted, and with happy and joyful minds🔽They made great offerings to Śākyamuni, seeking the peace of enlightenment.

original: byang chub zhi ba tshol zhing sh'akya thub la der ni mchod pa chen po byas; ;rgyan gyis legs brgyan bye ba dgu bcu drug gi gdugs rnams mngon sprul te //
analyzed: byang chub zhi ba tshol zhing sh'akya thub la der ni mchod pa chen po byas; ;rgyan gyis legs brgyan bye ba dgu bcu drug gi gdugs rnams mngon sprul te //
translated: They manifested nine hundred and sixty million parasols, beautifully adorned with ornaments,

original: bde bar gshegs la mchod cing rab tu dul ba'i yid kyis chags dang bral //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs la mchod cing rab tu dul ba'i yid kyis chags dang bral //
translated: And made offerings to the Sugata, their minds disciplined, free from attachment.

original: rgyan gyis legs brgyan bye ba dgu bcu drug gi rta rnams mngon sprul te //
analyzed: rgyan gyis legs brgyan bye ba dgu bcu drug gi rta rnams mngon sprul te //
translated: They manifested nine hundred and sixty million horses, beautifully adorned with ornaments,

original: kha dog sngo zhing rgyan kyang sngo ba'i rta la rgyal mtshan sngon pos brgyan //
analyzed: kha dog sngo zhing rgyan kyang sngo ba'i rta la rgyal mtshan sngon pos brgyan //
translated: Blue-colored horses adorned with blue banners.

original: de dag thams cad bar snang dong nas thub @144a *//
analyzed: de dag thams cad bar snang dong nas thub @144a *//
translated: All of them, in the sky,

original: la rta yis mchod pa byed //
analyzed: la rta yis mchod pa byed //
translated: Made offerings to the Sage with those horses.

original: klu yi bu mo de dag dang ba'i yid kyis thub la mgos phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: klu yi bu mo de dag dang ba'i yid kyis thub la mgos phyag 'tshal //
translated: Those nāga daughters, with pure minds, bowed their heads to the Sage.

original: mchog la mchod pa'i don du klu yi gnas nas klu yi sil snyan gyis //
analyzed: mchog la mchod pa'i don du klu yi gnas nas klu yi sil snyan gyis //
translated: For the sake of making offerings to the supreme one, from the nāga realm, with nāga cymbals,

original: mchod pa'i 'os gyur 'dren pa sh'akya thub la der ni mchod pa byas //
analyzed: mchod pa'i 'os gyur 'dren pa sh'akya thub la der ni mchod pa byas //
translated: They made offerings to the Guide, the Śākya Sage, who is worthy of offerings.

original: sil snyan de dag bde bar gshegs la mchod pa'i sgra de khams gsum grag /
analyzed: sil snyan de dag bde bar gshegs la mchod pa'i sgra de khams gsum grag /
translated: Those cymbals made an offering sound to the Sugata that resounded throughout the three realms.

original: sgra de thos pa'i sems can khrag khrig dag ni byang chub yang dag zhugs //
analyzed: sgra de thos pa'i sems can khrag khrig dag ni byang chub yang dag zhugs //
translated: The many quintillions of beings who heard that sound were established in enlightenment.

original: de dag rnams kyis der sprul mkha' la bla re chen po gcig tu gyur //
analyzed: de dag rnams kyis der sprul mkha' la bla re chen po gcig tu gyur //
translated: They emanated a great canopy in the sky above him.

original: phyogs bcu'i dpag tshad drug bcur rgyas shing 'gro ba thams cad khebs par gyur //
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i dpag tshad drug bcur rgyas shing 'gro ba thams cad khebs par gyur //
translated: It was sixty leagues in extent in the ten directions and covered all beings.

original: nor bu rin chen skar ma'i mdog gi gzi brjid phyogs su 'bar zhing gsal //
analyzed: nor bu rin chen skar ma'i mdog gi gzi brjid phyogs su 'bar zhing gsal //
translated: It was radiant with the splendor of precious jewels, the color of stars.

original: klu yi bu mo dga' nas 'gro ba'i don du rgyal la mchod pa byas //
analyzed: klu yi bu mo dga' nas 'gro ba'i don du rgyal la mchod pa byas //
translated: The nāga daughters, delighted, made offerings to the Jina for the benefit of beings.

original: gzhal du med pa'i sems bskyed dga' nas byang chub zhi ba tshol byed cing //
analyzed: gzhal du med pa'i sems bskyed dga' nas byang chub zhi ba tshol byed cing //
translated: They generated immeasurable joy and sought the peace of enlightenment.

original: 'jig rten don byed bde gshegs sangs rgyas 'jig rten mkhas pa grub par shog /
analyzed: 'jig rten don byed bde gshegs sangs rgyas 'jig rten mkhas pa grub par shog /
translated: “May we become buddhas, sugatas, who benefit the world, who are wise in the world, and who are accomplished!”

original: ji ltar stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni sems can sdug bsngal 'gro ba ltar //
analyzed: ji ltar stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni sems can sdug bsngal 'gro ba ltar //
translated: Just as you, O Lord of the Ten Forces, have taught the Dharma,

original: chos kyang bstan te sems can nyon mongs sdug bsngal bsgribs pa khrag khrig dgrol //
analyzed: chos kyang bstan te sems can nyon mongs sdug bsngal bsgribs pa khrag khrig dgrol //
translated: in order to liberate the myriads of beings obscured by the afflictions and suffering of beings.

original: chos rnams sgyu ma smig sgyu 'dra zhing lbu ba lta bur nyam chung la //
analyzed: chos rnams sgyu ma smig sgyu 'dra zhing lbu ba lta bur nyam chung la //
translated: The nature of phenomena is weak, like an illusion, a mirage, or foam,

original: char rgyun chu la phog pa'i chu bur lta bur 'jig cing bdag po med //
analyzed: char rgyun chu la phog pa'i chu bur lta bur 'jig cing bdag po med //
translated: perishing like a water bubble, without a self.

original: me @144b long nang gi gzugs brnyan 'dra bar 'gro ba thams cad btags nas ni //
analyzed: me @144b long nang gi gzugs brnyan 'dra bar 'gro ba thams cad btags nas ni //
translated: Having designated all beings as being like a reflection in a mirror,

original: 'gro ba dag la chos kyi rang bzhin yang dag de nyid bstan par bgyi //
analyzed: 'gro ba dag la chos kyi rang bzhin yang dag de nyid bstan par bgyi //
translated: I will teach them the true nature of phenomena.

original: sgyu ma bkod pa lta bur ma mchis rdzun pa byis pa rmongs bgyid pa //
analyzed: sgyu ma bkod pa lta bur ma mchis rdzun pa byis pa rmongs bgyid pa //
translated: Like an illusory display, they are unreal and deceive the childish,

original: skye bo mi mkhas ji bzhin ma 'tshal ba dag ma rung rab bgyid pa //
analyzed: skye bo mi mkhas ji bzhin ma 'tshal ba dag ma rung rab bgyid pa //
translated: but the unwise do not understand them as such and are ruined.🔽You, O sinless one, have seen that the phenomena that deceive the childish

original: byis pa rmongs bgyid chos rnams sdig med khyod kyis de ltar legs par gzigs //
analyzed: byis pa rmongs bgyid chos rnams sdig med khyod kyis de ltar legs par gzigs //
translated: are not real, and you have taught the Dharma to the world.

original: de dag ji ltar gzigs ba de bzhin de dag sems can rnams la bstan //
analyzed: de dag ji ltar gzigs ba de bzhin de dag sems can rnams la bstan //
translated: You have seen them as they are, and you have taught them to beings.

original: ji ltar sa chen 'di la sprin 'khrigs gyur na ri ltar gda' ba yang //
analyzed: ji ltar sa chen 'di la sprin 'khrigs gyur na ri ltar gda' ba yang //
translated: When the great earth is covered with clouds, it seems like a mountain.

original: yang dag tu na ri ltar ngo bo nyid kyis de la gnas ma mchis //
analyzed: yang dag tu na ri ltar ngo bo nyid kyis de la gnas ma mchis //
translated: But in reality, like a mountain, it has no inherent existence.

original: de ltar 'gro ba thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis dbang po rmongs par bgyid //
analyzed: de ltar 'gro ba thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis dbang po rmongs par bgyid //
translated: In the same way, all beings are without inherent existence, but the senses are confused.

original: shes pas brtags nas skye bo mkhas pa dag ni rmongs par 'gyur ma mchis //
analyzed: shes pas brtags nas skye bo mkhas pa dag ni rmongs par 'gyur ma mchis //
translated: When the wise examine with wisdom, they are not confused.

original: yang dag tu na 'gro ba thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis khyod ston pas //
analyzed: yang dag tu na 'gro ba thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis khyod ston pas //
translated: You have taught that in reality all beings are without inherent existence.

original: des na 'dren pa rgyal ba khyod la skye bo mkhas pa mi phyed 'gyur //
analyzed: des na 'dren pa rgyal ba khyod la skye bo mkhas pa mi phyed 'gyur //
translated: Therefore, wise beings do not waver in their faith in you, O Guide, O Victorious One.

original: khyod kyi sras rnams chos kyis yongs su tshim nas rdza ba la zam pa 'dra //
analyzed: khyod kyi sras rnams chos kyis yongs su tshim nas rdza ba la zam pa 'dra //
translated: Your sons are satisfied with the Dharma, like a thirsty man with water.

original: 'di ni byis pa'i skye bo'i yul ma ni 'gro ba 'di ni sgra phyir 'brang //
analyzed: 'di ni byis pa'i skye bo'i yul ma ni 'gro ba 'di ni sgra phyir 'brang //
translated: This is not the domain of childish beings, for beings follow after sound.

original: de lta lags pas sdig med yang dag ston pa byis pa'i skye bo'i mgon //
analyzed: de lta lags pas sdig med yang dag ston pa byis pa'i skye bo'i mgon //
translated: Therefore, O Faultless One, you are the true teacher, the protector of childish beings.

original: skyabs dang dpung gnyen gnas dang rten dang rtsa lag khyod la skyabs su mchi //
analyzed: skyabs dang dpung gnyen gnas dang rten dang rtsa lag khyod la skyabs su mchi //
translated: I take refuge in you, O protector, O friend, O place of rest, O support, O kinsman.

original: gzhal yas byang chub de btsal slad du rnam par 'dren pa khyod la @145a *//
analyzed: gzhal yas byang chub de btsal slad du rnam par 'dren pa khyod la @145a *//
translated: I make offerings to you, O leader, in order to seek the inconceivable enlightenment.

original: mchod // sangs rgyas gyur nas rtogs bgyid sdig bral 'jig rten don rnams bgyid par shog /
analyzed: mchod // sangs rgyas gyur nas rtogs bgyid sdig bral 'jig rten don rnams bgyid par shog /
translated: Having become a buddha, I will do what is to be done in the world, free from evil and with realization.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bu mo de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bu mo de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do //
translated: Then the Blessed One, understanding the superior intention of those nāga girls, smiled.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa //
translated: Then the venerable Aśvajit spoke to the Blessed One in verse:

original: 'jig rten na ni 'jig rten mkhas pa rnam par 'dren mchog khyod 'dzum mdzad //
analyzed: 'jig rten na ni 'jig rten mkhas pa rnam par 'dren mchog khyod 'dzum mdzad //
translated: In the world, O supreme leader of the world, you who are wise in the world, you smile.

original: dpal stug 'dzum pa mdzad la rgyu ma mchis pa bdag gis yod ma mthong //
analyzed: dpal stug 'dzum pa mdzad la rgyu ma mchis pa bdag gis yod ma mthong //
translated: I do not see any reason for this dense splendor of a smile.

original: mi yi dbang po dam pa 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni yang dag gsungs //
analyzed: mi yi dbang po dam pa 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni yang dag gsungs //
translated: O best of human lords, please explain the reason for your smile.

original: de thos lha mi lha min tshogs dang klu yi bu mo gsang ba pa //
analyzed: de thos lha mi lha min tshogs dang klu yi bu mo gsang ba pa //
translated: Hearing this, the hosts of gods, humans, and demigods, and the daughters of the nāgas,

original: dri ba rnams kyang skyob pa'i dgongs pa thos nas yid ni dga' bar 'gyur //
analyzed: dri ba rnams kyang skyob pa'i dgongs pa thos nas yid ni dga' bar 'gyur //
translated: Will be delighted to hear the intention of the protector in response to their questions.

original: 'jig rten dag na 'jig rten rnam 'dren khyod kyis rgyu rnams thams cad mkhyen //
analyzed: 'jig rten dag na 'jig rten rnam 'dren khyod kyis rgyu rnams thams cad mkhyen //
translated: In the world, you, the guide of the world, know all causes.

original: rgyal bas chos gang rgyu dang rnam pas mkhyen par ma gyur yod ma mchis //
analyzed: rgyal bas chos gang rgyu dang rnam pas mkhyen par ma gyur yod ma mchis //
translated: There is no dharma that the Victorious One does not know through its cause and aspect.

original: de ltar bde gshegs rgyal ba khyod kyis ji ltar thugs chud 'dzum rgyu gsungs //
analyzed: de ltar bde gshegs rgyal ba khyod kyis ji ltar thugs chud 'dzum rgyu gsungs //
translated: Thus, Sugata, Victor, please speak the reason for your smile.

original: de thos nas ni 'gro ba thams cad yid rangs dogs pa chad par 'gyur //
analyzed: de thos nas ni 'gro ba thams cad yid rangs dogs pa chad par 'gyur //
translated: Hearing this, all beings will be delighted and their doubts will be severed.

original: thub pa bde bar gshegs kyi bstan pa mchog la don kyang thob par mchi //
analyzed: thub pa bde bar gshegs kyi bstan pa mchog la don kyang thob par mchi //
translated: The Sage, the Well-Gone One, will attain the supreme teaching.

original: 'khor rnams 'di dag don myong gyur nas yid ni rab tu zhi bar 'gyur //
analyzed: 'khor rnams 'di dag don myong gyur nas yid ni rab tu zhi bar 'gyur //
translated: The retinue, having experienced this meaning, will attain mental peace.

original: kun rtog dbang du mi 'gyur byang chub yid kyis rgyal ba'i spyod nyan 'gyur //
analyzed: kun rtog dbang du mi 'gyur byang chub yid kyis rgyal ba'i spyod nyan 'gyur //
translated: Not under the power of conceptualization, with a mind of awakening, they will listen to the conduct of the Victorious Ones.

original: @145b bde gshegs khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad don thos rang byung nyid du nges par 'byung //
analyzed: @145b bde gshegs khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad don thos rang byung nyid du nges par 'byung //
translated: Sugata, having heard the reason for your smile, I am certain of self-arising.

original: 'khor 'di rgyal ba khyod kyi zhal nas 'dzum mthong the tshom 'tshal gyur te //
analyzed: 'khor 'di rgyal ba khyod kyi zhal nas 'dzum mthong the tshom 'tshal gyur te //
translated: This retinue, having seen the Victorious One’s face smile, has become doubtful.

original: sdug bsngal dogs bcas yid mi bde zhing chos la som nyi gang 'tshal ba //
analyzed: sdug bsngal dogs bcas yid mi bde zhing chos la som nyi gang 'tshal ba //
translated: With anxious minds, they are unhappy and doubtful about the Dharma.

original: de dag la ni thub pa ston pas dogs bsal the tshom dgum du gsol //
analyzed: de dag la ni thub pa ston pas dogs bsal the tshom dgum du gsol //
translated: For them, O Sage, Teacher, please clear away doubt and dispel anxiety.

original: drang srong khyod kyis gang slad 'dzum bstan myur du bka' stsol the tshom khum //
analyzed: drang srong khyod kyis gang slad 'dzum bstan myur du bka' stsol the tshom khum //
translated: Sage, for what reason did you smile? Please quickly speak and dispel doubt.

original: rgyal ba gang gis de ring yid ni rnam par sbyangs shing bdud bcom thul //
analyzed: rgyal ba gang gis de ring yid ni rnam par sbyangs shing bdud bcom thul //
translated: Victorious One, who today has purified their mind and conquered and subdued Mara?

original: su zhig yid rab tshim nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dam pa bgyis //
analyzed: su zhig yid rab tshim nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dam pa bgyis //
translated: Who, having satisfied their mind, has made the most excellent offering to the Bhagavan?

original: 'di ni su yi mthu lags ston pa 'gro ba'i mdun du 'di bka' stsol //
analyzed: 'di ni su yi mthu lags ston pa 'gro ba'i mdun du 'di bka' stsol //
translated: Whose power is this? Teacher, please speak of this to the world.

original: thos nas bdag cag yid rangs mchog tu dga' ba skyes nas bde bar 'gyur //
analyzed: thos nas bdag cag yid rangs mchog tu dga' ba skyes nas bde bar 'gyur //
translated: Having heard, we will be delighted and give rise to supreme joy and happiness.

original: khyod kyi zhabs kyi drung du 'dus pa'i gro ba 'di dag the tshom 'tshal //
analyzed: khyod kyi zhabs kyi drung du 'dus pa'i gro ba 'di dag the tshom 'tshal //
translated: The assembly gathered at your feet has doubts.

original: 'dzum rgyu dga' ba bskyed pa bka' stsol thub pa the tshom bsal du gsol //
analyzed: 'dzum rgyu dga' ba bskyed pa bka' stsol thub pa the tshom bsal du gsol //
translated: Please explain the cause of your smile, O Sage, and dispel their doubts.

original: de thos lha dang bcas pa'i 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom ma mchis 'gyur //
analyzed: de thos lha dang bcas pa'i 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom ma mchis 'gyur //
translated: When they hear it, this world with its gods will be free of doubt.

original: rgyal pa'i gsung sgra yang dag thos nas de dag yid dga' 'gyur //
analyzed: rgyal pa'i gsung sgra yang dag thos nas de dag yid dga' 'gyur //
translated: Having heard the true speech of the Victorious One, they will be delighted.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa //
translated: Then the Blessed One replied to the venerable Aśvajit in verse:

original: rta thul legs so rgyal ba'i dgongs pa 'dzum pa 'di ni legs par dris //
analyzed: rta thul legs so rgyal ba'i dgongs pa 'dzum pa 'di ni legs par dris //
translated: “Aśvajit, it is excellent that you have asked about the intention of the Victorious One’s smile.

original: klu yi bu mos mchod de 'jig rten phan phyir ngas ni 'dzum pa bstan //
analyzed: klu yi bu mos mchod de 'jig rten phan phyir ngas ni 'dzum pa bstan //
translated: I have shown my smile in order to benefit the world, having been worshipped by the nāga maiden.

original: de yi 'bras bu bstan gyi yid gnyis tha ba spangs pa'i sems kyis @146a *//
analyzed: de yi 'bras bu bstan gyi yid gnyis tha ba spangs pa'i sems kyis @146a *//
translated: Listen to the explanation of its result, with a mind free from doubt and harshness.

original: nyon; ;gang gi don du ngas ni 'dzum pa 'dir mdzad nga yi tshig la nyon //
analyzed: nyon; ;gang gi don du ngas ni 'dzum pa 'dir mdzad nga yi tshig la nyon //
translated: Listen to my words, for which I have shown this smile.

original: klu yi bu mo 'di dag chags med yid kyis byang chub yang dag zhugs //
analyzed: klu yi bu mo 'di dag chags med yid kyis byang chub yang dag zhugs //
translated: “These nāga daughters, with minds free of attachment, are truly set out for enlightenment.

original: 'gro ba thams cad stong bar rnam gzhig blo ldan dogs med legs par gnas //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad stong bar rnam gzhig blo ldan dogs med legs par gnas //
translated: The wise ones, who contemplate the emptiness of all beings, remain well, without fear.

original: 'di ni byed med tshor med gang zag med cing skye ba po yang med //
analyzed: 'di ni byed med tshor med gang zag med cing skye ba po yang med //
translated: “This is without a creator, without feeling, without a person, and without one who is born.

original: chos rnams 'di dag rdzun zhing smig rgyu mtshungs la me long gzugs brnyan 'dra //
analyzed: chos rnams 'di dag rdzun zhing smig rgyu mtshungs la me long gzugs brnyan 'dra //
translated: These phenomena are false, like a mirage, and like a reflection in a mirror.

original: 'di dag rnams kyis mchod byas byas gzo blo gros yang dag nas shes so //
analyzed: 'di dag rnams kyis mchod byas byas gzo blo gros yang dag nas shes so //
translated: “They have made offerings to me, and their minds, which are grateful and wise, understand.

original: rgyal ba'i chos nyid dang ni 'gro ba stong zhing bdag po med mthong legs //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i chos nyid dang ni 'gro ba stong zhing bdag po med mthong legs //
translated: It is good to see the nature of the Victorious One and the emptiness and absence of a self in beings.

original: mchod pa rnam par phye zhing legs par bkod pa 'di dag sgyu ma 'dra //
analyzed: mchod pa rnam par phye zhing legs par bkod pa 'di dag sgyu ma 'dra //
translated: These offerings, which are distinguished and well arranged, are like an illusion.

original: byang chub gzhal yas gang du smon lam btab pa de yang 'di 'drar stong //
analyzed: byang chub gzhal yas gang du smon lam btab pa de yang 'di 'drar stong //
translated: The immeasurable palace of enlightenment, where aspirations are made, is also like this, empty.

original: nga la gzhal yas mchod pa de byas pa dang 'gro ba stong skyes pas //
analyzed: nga la gzhal yas mchod pa de byas pa dang 'gro ba stong skyes pas //
translated: “I have made offerings to the immeasurable palace, and beings have been born in emptiness.

original: klu las shi 'phos nas ni lha gnas brgya byin gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur //
analyzed: klu las shi 'phos nas ni lha gnas brgya byin gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur //
translated: Having died and transmigrated from the nāgas, they go to the divine realm of Śakra.

original: sum cu rtsa gsum song ste lha yi nang du dga' bar tshe rdzogs nas //🔽ma smad grags dang ldan pa'i lha gnas 'thab bral gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum song ste lha yi nang du dga' bar tshe rdzogs nas // ma smad grags dang ldan pa'i lha gnas 'thab bral gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur //
translated: After death, he will be reborn in the Heaven of the Thirty-Three,🔽And then in the Heaven Free from Strife.🔽In the Heaven Free from Strife, he will enjoy divine pleasures,🔽And then, in the Heaven of Joy, he will be like a divine prince.

original: 'thab bral lha nang gnas te lha yi dga' ba spyod //
analyzed: 'thab bral lha nang gnas te lha yi dga' ba spyod //
translated: In the Heaven of Joy, he will enjoy divine pleasures,🔽And then, in the Heaven of Delighting in Emanations, he will be like a divine prince.🔽In the Heaven of Delighting in Emanations, he will enjoy divine pleasures,🔽And then, in the Heaven of Making Use of Others’ Emanations, he will be like a divine prince.🔽In the Heaven of Making Use of Others’ Emanations, he will enjoy divine pleasures,🔽And then, in the Heaven of the Four Kings, he will be like a divine prince.🔽In the Heaven of the Four Kings, he will enjoy divine pleasures,🔽And then, in the Heaven of the Thirty-Three, he will be like a divine prince.

original: lha 'gyur bde gshegs sras rnams de ni tshe yi tshad du gnas par 'gyur //
analyzed: lha 'gyur bde gshegs sras rnams de ni tshe yi tshad du gnas par 'gyur //
translated: In the Heaven of the Thirty-Three, he will enjoy divine pleasures,🔽And then, in the Heaven of the Yāma gods, he will be like a divine prince.🔽In the Heaven of the Yāma gods, he will enjoy divine pleasures,🔽And then, in the Heaven of Joy, he will be like a divine prince.🔽In the Heaven of Joy, he will enjoy divine pleasures,🔽And then, in the Heaven Free from Strife, he will be like a divine prince.

original: rgyal ba'i sras rnams 'thab bral dga' ba spyad nas che tshad zad pa dang // dga' ldan gnas su lha yi grong khyer lha dang brtul @146b zhugs 'dra bar 'gyur //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i sras rnams 'thab bral dga' ba spyad nas che tshad zad pa dang // dga' ldan gnas su lha yi grong khyer lha dang brtul @146b zhugs 'dra bar 'gyur //
translated: In the Heaven Free from Strife, he will enjoy divine pleasures,🔽And then, in the Heaven of the Four Kings, he will be like a divine prince.

original: de dag de ni lha yi bu mos bskor nas lha yi dga' ba spyod //
analyzed: de dag de ni lha yi bu mos bskor nas lha yi dga' ba spyod //
translated: In the Heaven of the Four Kings, he will enjoy divine pleasures,

original: padma chus mi chags pa bzhin du bde gshegs mi gnas blo can gnas //🔽'gro ba thams cad stong par rtogs rig blo las nyams par yong mi 'gyur //
analyzed: padma chus mi chags pa bzhin du bde gshegs mi gnas blo can gnas //🔽'gro ba thams cad stong par rtogs rig blo las nyams par yong mi 'gyur //
translated: And then, in the Heaven of the Thirty-Three, he will be like a divine prince.

original: skyob pa rnams kyi dran pa rdo la brkos pa bzhin du yong mi nyams //
analyzed: skyob pa rnams kyi dran pa rdo la brkos pa bzhin du yong mi nyams //
translated: The recollection of the protectors will be as if carved in stone.

original: de dag dga' ldan gnas der gnas te lha yi dga' ba spyad nas ni; ;tshe tshad yongs su zad nas de tshe rab 'phrul dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de dag dga' ldan gnas der gnas te lha yi dga' ba spyad nas ni; ;tshe tshad yongs su zad nas de tshe rab 'phrul dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur //
translated: “ ‘They will dwell in the realm of Tuṣita, enjoying divine pleasures, And when their lifespans are exhausted, they will go to the realm of Nirmāṇarati.

original: bde gshegs ma smad grags ldan der yang lha mo'i tshogs kyis mchod 'gyur te //
analyzed: bde gshegs ma smad grags ldan der yang lha mo'i tshogs kyis mchod 'gyur te //
translated: The Sugata, the renowned one without reproach, will be worshiped by the hosts of goddesses there.

original: mi gnas blo gros ldan pa tshe chad bar du gnas na gnas par 'gyur //
analyzed: mi gnas blo gros ldan pa tshe chad bar du gnas na gnas par 'gyur //
translated: The wise ones who do not abide will remain there for as long as their lifespans last.

original: de dag gnas der rab 'phrul gyur te lha yi dga' ba spyad nas ni //
analyzed: de dag gnas der rab 'phrul gyur te lha yi dga' ba spyad nas ni //
translated: “ ‘They will dwell in that realm, enjoying divine pleasures,

original: mkhas pa che zad blo gros ldan pas chos kyi mthar ni phyin gyur nas //
analyzed: mkhas pa che zad blo gros ldan pas chos kyi mthar ni phyin gyur nas //
translated: And when the great wise ones have exhausted their lifespans, they will reach the end of the Dharma.

original: 'dren pa bsam pa dag pa chags med yid ldan chos kyi bsam pa can //
analyzed: 'dren pa bsam pa dag pa chags med yid ldan chos kyi bsam pa can //
translated: The pure-minded guides, with unattached minds and the intention of the Dharma,

original: chos dang ldan rnams gzhan 'phrul gnas su lha 'du bar ni 'gro bar 'gyur //
analyzed: chos dang ldan rnams gzhan 'phrul gnas su lha 'du bar ni 'gro bar 'gyur //
translated: Will go to the assembly of gods in the realm of Paranirmitavaśavartin.

original: de dag la gnas de na gnas shing lha yi dga' ba spyod par 'gyur //
analyzed: de dag la gnas de na gnas shing lha yi dga' ba spyod par 'gyur //
translated: They will dwell there and enjoy divine pleasures.

original: bde gshegs ma rmongs blo ldan de dag rang gi tshe tshad gnas par 'gyur //
analyzed: bde gshegs ma rmongs blo ldan de dag rang gi tshe tshad gnas par 'gyur //
translated: The Sugatas, who are not confused, remain in their own lifespan.

original: mya ngan 'das ltar lha yi 'dod pa'i yon tan mnyam nyid zhi bar rtogs //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das ltar lha yi 'dod pa'i yon tan mnyam nyid zhi bar rtogs //
translated: They realize the equality of the divine qualities of nirvana and peace.

original: bsam gtan bsam pas tshangs gnas ma smad grags dang ldan par 'gro bar 'gyur //
analyzed: bsam gtan bsam pas tshangs gnas ma smad grags dang ldan par 'gro bar 'gyur //
translated: By the power of concentration, they go to the higher realms and become famous.

original: tshangs pa'i gnas su bsam gtan mkhas shing bsam gtan 'bras bu spyad gyur nas //🔽der gnas dpe med @147a *//
analyzed: tshangs pa'i gnas su bsam gtan mkhas shing bsam gtan 'bras bu spyad gyur nas // der gnas dpe med @147a *//
translated: The wise ones who practice concentration in the Brahma realms

original: gyur cing byang chub yid kyis bskal par gnas par 'gyur //
analyzed: gyur cing byang chub yid kyis bskal par gnas par 'gyur //
translated: remain there for countless eons, their minds set on enlightenment.

original: de dag bskal par tshangs gnas mthun par ye shes don gnyer brtul zhugs bzang //
analyzed: de dag bskal par tshangs gnas mthun par ye shes don gnyer brtul zhugs bzang //
translated: For eons, they strive for wisdom in the Brahma realms, with excellent discipline.

original: thub pa mkhas pa thabs mkhas de dag 'jig rten don ni mtha' yas byed //
analyzed: thub pa mkhas pa thabs mkhas de dag 'jig rten don ni mtha' yas byed //
translated: The wise and skillful sages act for the sake of the limitless world.

original: mkhas thub de dag de na bsam gtan spyod yul bsam gtan chags pa med //
analyzed: mkhas thub de dag de na bsam gtan spyod yul bsam gtan chags pa med //
translated: The wise sages there, in the realm of concentration, are not attached to concentration.

original: bsam gtan bde ba mnyam nyid 'drar rig byang chub phyir ni dbang po zhi //
analyzed: bsam gtan bde ba mnyam nyid 'drar rig byang chub phyir ni dbang po zhi //
translated: They know the equality of the bliss of concentration, and their faculties are peaceful for the sake of enlightenment.

original: kun du grol yid drang srong byang chub phyir ni byang chub blo dang ldan //
analyzed: kun du grol yid drang srong byang chub phyir ni byang chub blo dang ldan //
translated: The sages who are liberated in every way, who are wise in the pursuit of awakening,

original: mya ngan 'das pa lta bur bsam gtan blo gcig zhi ba'i mtshan nyid 'gyur //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das pa lta bur bsam gtan blo gcig zhi ba'i mtshan nyid 'gyur //
translated: And who are intent on the characteristics of peace, are like those who have attained nirvāṇa.

original: bde bar gshegs pa dang bcom ldan sras po byang chub zhi ba yongs tshol ba //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa dang bcom ldan sras po byang chub zhi ba yongs tshol ba //
translated: The sons of the Sugata, the Bhagavān, who are intent on the peace of awakening,

original: tshang pa'i yid ldan 'jig rten don byed de dag tshangs gnas de na gnas //
analyzed: tshang pa'i yid ldan 'jig rten don byed de dag tshangs gnas de na gnas //
translated: Are those who have the mind of Brahmā, who act for the benefit of the world, and who abide in the realm of Brahmā.

original: kun kyang tshangs pa'i blo ldan mthar phyin sha stag byang chub don gyi phyir //
analyzed: kun kyang tshangs pa'i blo ldan mthar phyin sha stag byang chub don gyi phyir //
translated: All of them are endowed with the mind of Brahmā, have reached the ultimate, and are intent on the pursuit of awakening.🔽They teach the definitive emergence that transcends the three realms, the intention of the self-originated ones.

original: rang byung dgongs pa khams gsum la ma las 'das pa'i nges par 'byung ba ston; ;tshangs pa la ni gus pa bskyed nas 'gro ba byang chub tshol bar 'gyur //
analyzed: rang byung dgongs pa khams gsum la ma las 'das pa'i nges par 'byung ba ston; ;tshangs pa la ni gus pa bskyed nas 'gro ba byang chub tshol bar 'gyur //
translated: Having generated respect for Brahmā, beings will pursue awakening.

original: tshangs pa'i bsam pa rang byung bsam pa nyes 'byung mthar thug shes nas ni //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i bsam pa rang byung bsam pa nyes 'byung mthar thug shes nas ni //
translated: Having understood the intention of Brahmā, the self-originated intention that is the ultimate emergence of faults,

original: bde bar gshegs kyi bstan pa mchog la brtson pa de dag 'gro ba la /
analyzed: bde bar gshegs kyi bstan pa mchog la brtson pa de dag 'gro ba la /
translated: Those who are diligent in the supreme teaching of the Sugata will proceed.

analyzed: ci nas chos tshul 'bras bu myur du shes 'gyur de ltar chos kyang ston //
translated: They teach the Dharma in that way so that the Dharma way may be quickly understood.

original: de dag tshangs gnas de na gnas /
analyzed: de dag tshangs gnas de na gnas /
translated: They dwell in that Brahma realm.

original: @147b shing 'jig rten dag la byang chub phyir //
analyzed: @147b shing 'jig rten dag la byang chub phyir //
translated: They go to many quintillions of worlds in order to awaken the world.

original: phan pa byas nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang po byang chub bkod //
analyzed: phan pa byas nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang po byang chub bkod //
translated: Having benefited, they establish many quintillions of beings in awakening.

analyzed: rgyal ba kun la mchod phyir 'jig rten khams mang khrag khrig 'gro bar 'gyur //

analyzed: dbang po zhi ba de dag bskal pa skar ma 'dra la rgyal bar 'gyur //
translated: As the stars in the night.🔽The devas, humans, nāgas, Suparṇīs, and asuras,

analyzed: lha dang mi dang klu dang 'dab bzang dag dang lha min bcas pa dang // dri za grul bum mi'am ci tshogs gnod sbyin 'gror bcas dga' zhing mgu //
translated: The Gandharvas, kumbhāṇḍas, kiṃnaras, and the hosts of yakṣas and rākṣasas are delighted.

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub tu ni yongs sbyang chos kyi stobs rnyed pa //
translated: The Bhagavān has purified and gained the power of the Dharma of awakening.

analyzed: de dag thams cad yi rang thal sbyar bde bar gshegs la ma gos phyag 'tshal //
translated: They all rejoice, their palms placed together, and they praise the Sugata.

analyzed: klu'i bu mo lung bstan pa'i le'u ste /
translated: This concludes the chapter on the prediction to the nāga girls, the eighth in the “Ratnaketu” section of the Great Collection of Mahāyāna sūtras.

analyzed: bdun pa'o //// de nas klu'i bu mo de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong /

analyzed: yongs su rdzogs par rig nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' la sogs pa klu bye ba phrag dgu bcu ngo mtshar thob par gyur te /

analyzed: ma gsan pa'am /

original: legs par gsungs pa /
analyzed: legs par gsungs pa /

original: yang dag par mthong ba /
analyzed: yang dag par mthong ba /

analyzed: rims nad med pa /

analyzed: dus chad pa med pa /

analyzed: nye bar gtod pa /
translated: and well-established.

original: 'di mthong @148a *//
analyzed: 'di mthong @148a *//
translated: This is seen

original: ba la don yod pa /
analyzed: ba la don yod pa /

analyzed: ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba ste /

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa de ni /

analyzed: rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba mnga' ba'o //
translated: They have great magical powers and great might.🔽“It is amazing that the Blessed One’s teaching of the Dharma has been understood by those who are women, who are fickle, unstable, and inconstant.

translated: It is amazing that the Blessed One’s community of disciples has entered the right path,🔽the straight path,

analyzed: ngo mtshar che'o //

translated: Thinking this, they made offerings to the Blessed One with great amazement, filling the entire Jambudvīpa up to the edge of the ocean with great clouds of incense, pervading this entire world with the fragrance of incense.

analyzed: n+ya gro dha'i kun dga' ra ba de yang rin thang med pa'i nor bu rin po ches chal bar bkang ngo //

analyzed: klu'i me tog gi 'dun khang rgyar dpag tshad drug cu yod pa rin po che sna bdun gyi ka ba dang ldan pa dag mngon par sprul to //
